mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from petty_cash
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into petty_cash (req_number, req_date, paid_to, req_amount, amount_in_word, category, description, funding_source_id, need_approval, reason_of_rejection, approval_date, is_approved, counter, upload_path, created_by, is_done, approved_by, paid_by, paid_date, reason_of_cancellation, processed_by, created_date) values (#{reqNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{paidTo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reqAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amountInWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundingSourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{needApproval,jdbcType=BIT}, #{reasonOfRejection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isApproved,jdbcType=BIT}, #{counter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uploadPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDone,jdbcType=BIT}, #{approvedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paidBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paidDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reasonOfCancellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE})
